name: Chris J. Price
content: Staff profiles  :		Department of Computer Science ,		Aberystwyth UniversityProf Chris Price Emeritus Professor Department of Computer Science Contact Details Email: cjp@aber.ac.uk Research Portal Profile Publications Li, Y, Li, F, Yang, K, Price, C & Shen, Q 2017, 'Remote sensing image registration based on Gaussian-Hermite moments and pseudo-RANSAC algorithm', Remote Sensing Letters, vol. 8, no. 12, pp. 1163–1172. 10.1080/2150704X.2017.1364874Chen, C, MacParthalain, N, Li, Y, Price, C, Quek, C & Shen, Q 2016, 'Rough-fuzzy rule interpolation', Information Sciences, vol. 351, pp. 1-17. 10.1016/j.ins.2016.02.036Bai, B, Li, Y, Fan, J, Price, C & Shen, Q 2015, 'Object tracking based on incremental Bi-2DPCA learning with sparse structure', Applied Optics, vol. 54, no. 10, pp. 2897-2907. 10.1364/AO.54.002897Song, J, Zhu, Z & Price, C 2014, 'Feature Grouping for Intrusion Detection Based on Mutual Information', Journal of Communications, vol. 9, no. 12, pp. 987-993. 10.12720/jcm.9.12.987-993Song, J, Zhu, Z, Scully, PMD & Price, C 2014, 'Modified Mutual Information-based Feature Selection for Intrusion Detection Systems in Decision Tree Learning', Journal of Computers, vol. 9, no. 7, pp. 1542-1546. 10.4304/jcp.9.7.1542-1546More publications on the Research Portal
